By "load aspect" do you mean opening a .aj file in the AspectJ editor?
The stack trace you give looks like it occurred when shutting down the workspace - so it might relate to a different problem. If you can consistently reproduce the opening aspect problem, can you check the error log to see if any other errors are written to the log when the error occurs?

I can't progress this bug without answers to the above questions - the stack trace does not appear to be related to the problem mentioned in the abstract. Please reopen with more information if you still see this problem.
